metadata.title: Sample H5P Content
metadata.licenseExtras: This content is provided as a sample for testing purposes.

panels.title: Welcome to H5P
panels.content: H5P makes it easy to create, share and reuse HTML5 content and applications.

panels.title: Getting Started
panels.content:
To get started with H5P, you need to:

  1. Install H5P libraries
  2. Create H5P content
  3. Use the content in your activities

panels.title: Need Help?
panels.content: If you need help with H5P, check out the H5P documentation.
